name: Dicefarmer
description:
Having taken over the family dice-sheep farm, you struggle to make ends meet.

Try to breed the best dice-sheep you can in order to get money to buy upgrades.

How to play
  • Breed die-sheep by dragging-dropping. The new die-sheep will inherit color and value from its parents, with a slight chance of mutating into a new color/value
  • There is a limit to how many dice-sheep your pen can hold! Send doubles to slaughter by dragging-dropping a die-sheep to the truck.
  • Sell your die-sheep to the customers. If you let too many customers wait without getting their desired die-sheep, the game is lost.
Credits

Programming: Robin Toller Hovler

3D artist & Art Director: Jonathan Dewoon

3D artist & Level Design: Edvin Edenhage
